author: Anonymous Atom
title: Handin submission during exam
question:
I have a pretty complicated CWL password so it's impossible for me to remember it. Would I be allowed to keep open a text file with my password in it so I can easily use it during submission? 
(Note- during mt1, I copied and commented the password onto the problem starter file and then removed them right before submission. I repeated this for every problem. I found this a bit tedious so I'm asking now.)
student_answer: You can also change your password to something easy to remember now and then change it back after the exam.
